How I Support Participants

Understanding Behaviour

I work to understand the function of behaviour through respectful, evidence-informed assessment. This helps identify what the participant needs to feel safe, supported, and successful.

Building Skills & Capacity

Support focuses on developing practical skills, improving communication, and strengthening daily routines to enhance independence and wellbeing.

Collaborative Support

I work closely with families, support workers, and providers to ensure strategies are understood, implemented consistently, and aligned with the participant‚Äôs goals.

Why Support Coordinators Choose Me

Clear Communication

Coordinators receive timely updates, realistic timeframes, and transparent expectations throughout the process.

Immediate Capacity

No long waitlists ‚Äî assessments and PBS plans can begin promptly, including urgent or high‚Äërisk referrals.

Compliance‚ÄëAligned Practice

All documentation meets NDIS Quality and Safeguards Commission requirements, including restrictive practice reporting.

NDIS Suitability & Compliance

I am a Suitable NDIS Behaviour Support Practitioner (ID: P1636047) and practice in accordance with the NDIS (Restrictive Practices and Behaviour Support) Rules 2018. My work prioritises safety, dignity, and evidence‚Äëinformed decision‚Äëmaking.
